channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- XML Sitemaps
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- XML Sitemaps

item.title: CVE-2021-25088|2024-08-03T19:56:09.909Z -- unknown -- xml%20sitemaps
item.description: The XML Sitemaps WordPress plugin before 4.1.3 does not sanitise and escape a settings before outputting it in the Debug page, which could allow high privilege users to perform Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed (for example in multisite setup)
